summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the preparation of plans, specifications, cost estimates for and the improvement of a portion of the Minor and Yesler Neighborhoods by the design and installation of street trees on 23rd Avenue from East Union Street to East Yesler Way and landscaping of certain planting strips at 23rd Avenue and East Terrace Street and 23rd Avenue and East Yesler Way and making an appropriation from the Neighborhood Improvement Fund therefor.
